verses.verse: I commend <S%G4921><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> Phoebe <S%G5402><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sister <S%G79><s%>, who is <S%G5607><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> that is <S%G3588><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Cenchreae <S%G2747><s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> ye receive <S%G4327><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, worthily <S%G516><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye assist <S%G3936><s%> her <S%G846><s%> in1722, 3739 whatsoever <S%G302><s%> matter <S%G4229><s%> she may have need <S%G5535><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> she <S%G846><s%> herself <S%G3778><s%> also hath been <S%G1096><s%> a helper <S%G4368><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%>, and2532, 2532 of mine <S%G846><s%> own self <S%G1700><s%>.
Salute <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4252><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila <S%G207><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow-workers <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>,

who3748, 5294 for <S%G5228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> laid down <S%G5294><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> necks <S%G5137><s%>; unto whom <S%G3739><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3441><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> give thanks <S%G2168><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>:

and <S%G2532><s%> salute the church <S%G1577><s%> that is in <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> Epaenetus <S%G1866><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the firstfruits <S%G536><s%> of Asia <S%G882><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
Salute <S%G782><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> bestowed <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> labor <S%G2872><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G2248><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Andronicus <S%G408><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Junias <S%G2458><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> kinsmen <S%G4773><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow-prisoners <S%G4869><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> of note <S%G1978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have been <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.
Salute <S%G782><s%> Ampliatus <S%G291><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Urbanus <S%G3773><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fellow-worker <S%G4904><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Stachys <S%G4720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Apelles <S%G559><s%> the approved <S%G1384><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> them that are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the household of Aristobulus <S%G711><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Herodion <S%G2267><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> kinsman <S%G4773><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> them <S%G3488><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3488><s%> household of Narcissus <S%G3488><s%>, that are <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Tryphaena <S%G5170><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Tryphosa <S%G5173><s%>, who labor <S%G2872><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. Salute <S%G782><s%> Persis <S%G4069><s%> the beloved <S%G27><s%>, who <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G2872><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.
Salute <S%G782><s%> Rufus <S%G4504><s%> the chosen <S%G1588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mine <S%G1700><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Asyncritus <S%G799><s%>, Phlegon <S%G5393><s%>, Hermes <S%G2060><s%>, Patrobas <S%G3969><s%>, Hermas <S%G2057><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that are with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> Philologus <S%G5378><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Julia <S%G2456><s%>, Nereus <S%G3517><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sister <S%G79><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Olympas <S%G3652><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> that are with <S%G4862><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

Salute <S%G782><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a <S%G5370><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> kiss <S%G5370><s%>. All the churches <S%G1577><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, mark <S%G4648><s%> them that are causing <S%G4160><s%> the divisions <S%G1370><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> occasions of stumbling <S%G4625><s%>, contrary to <S%G3844><s%> the doctrine <S%G1322><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> learned <S%G3129><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> turn away <S%G1578><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that are such <S%G5108><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord2962, 2424 Christ <S%G5547><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> their own <S%G1438><s%> belly <S%G2836><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> their smooth <S%G5542><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fair speech <S%G2129><s%> they beguile <S%G1818><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the innocent <S%G172><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> is come abroad <S%G864><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men <S%G5463><s%>. I rejoice therefore <S%G3767><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>: <S%G1909><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> I would have <S%G2309><s%> you5209, 1511 wise <S%G4680><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> simple <S%G185><s%> unto that <S%G1519><s%> which is evil <S%G2556><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> shall bruise <S%G4937><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> feet4228, 1722 shortly <S%G5034><s%>. The grace <S%G5485><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>.

Timothy <S%G5095><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> fellow-worker <S%G4904><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> Lucius <S%G3066><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jason <S%G2394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Sosipater <S%G4989><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> kinsmen <S%G4773><s%>.
I <S%G1473><s%> Tertius <S%G5060><s%>, who write <S%G1125><s%> the epistle <S%G1992><s%>, salute <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>.

Gaius <S%G1050><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> host <S%G3581><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G1577><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>, saluteth <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>. Erastus <S%G2037><s%> the treasurer <S%G3623><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> saluteth <S%G782><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Quartus <S%G2890><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him that is able <S%G1410><s%> to establish <S%G4741><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the preaching <S%G2782><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which hath been kept in silence <S%G4601><s%> through times <S%G5550><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%>,

but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is manifested <S%G5319><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets <S%G4397><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the <S%G2316><s%> commandment <S%G2003><s%> of the <S%G2316><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, is made known <S%G1107><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> obedience <S%G5218><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%>:

to the only <S%G3441><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, to whom be <S%G3739><s%> the glory <S%G1223><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G1577><s%>.
